caption.center: DAVID L. PETERSON, PETITIONER, v. HONORABLE SAMUEL Z. MONTOYA, FIRST
JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT JUDGE, COUNTY OF SANTA FE, STATE OF NEW MEXICO,

opinion.opinion_text:
COMPTON, Chief Justice, and CARMODY, CHAVEZ, MOISE and NOBLE, Justices, concurring.
Ordered that petitioner be and he is hereby granted free process herein; and
Further ordered that the petition for writ of mandamus be and the same is hereby denied.
